name: Magnum Wine Bottle Lamp - Joan Claparols labels
description:
Pescallums is a project iniciated in Barcelona with a very clear purpose: to give beautiful beverage bottles a hand made treatment, a second life converted in pretty lamps. We ask cocktail bars, restaurants and friends to keep nice bottles and later we create lovely lights. We recycle this bottles giving them a new use, preventing them to end in a landfield.

Our mission is not only to sell this lamps, but help people with difficulties in our town, people who can't find any job. We would like to open a small workshop someday, where these people could work helping us in all the processes of creating amazing and unique pieces. 

To be honest, we are just starting, but we love these lamps and we would like you to have one. You need a new light at home, something that makes you remember your beliefs and enlighten your way.

This lamp is something unique,  treated carefully and with a lot of love. Perfect as a present for someone special or, why not, for you.

But, what's inside? 

Magnum Wine Bottle Lamp with socket and cable (1,5m ) with EU plug
Label of Joan Claparols painting
Charming Lamp Shade

*If you need another kind of electrical plug adapter, please tell us and we will do our best to change the cable for one compatible with your country*

*Light not included, we recommend 60W Eco friendly, but you can use another kind of light depending on the intensity you want* 

What if I don't like the lamp shade?

*We have already tried other combinations of bottle-lamp shade and we think this one is the best. But, if you don't like this lamp shade, please feel free to ask: we can show you other styles. 

Will it be broken at unpack?

We will do the best to protect the lamp. In case of damage at unpacking, please take a picture and send us an e-mail as soon as possible. We will try to solve this issue with creativity and speed. But remember that this lamp is unique, so we cannot promise the same lamp.
